attributes.action: Intervene and ensure that Sharon Shoesmith, Director of children`s services at Haringey County council  looses her job, for her Department`s failure to protect  a vunerable child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inquiry after Inquiry, Cleveland, Rochdale the Orkney Islands, Victoria Columbie and now Baby P,  costing the taxpayer millions of pounds.
Nothing is ever learned by past mistakes and Social workers are never made accountable for their actions, which once again has resulted in the death of a vulnerable child.
The so called child protectors should have their employment terminated forthwith and be struck of the Social care Register.
Sharon Shoesmith and team, HANG YOUR HEADS IN SHAME.
Alison Stevens Parents Against Injustice, www.parentsagainstinjustice.org.uk

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
We cannot accept petitions containg links to other websites
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
